#summary Requirements and procedure.

= Introduction =
SocialConnect is compatible with Python Django revision 9843 and Python 2.5.


SocialConnect works using several external libraries:
* pyFacebook (revision 173)
* opensocial-restful 
* restclient (version 0.9.9)
* oauth (revision 868)
